= PHPFunctions
:lang: en
:keywords: PHPFunctions
:position: 10001

//  auto generated content Thu, 06 Jul 2017 00:59:22 +0200
== Short description

The following PHP functions can also be used in the CMS syntax. Their usage corresponds to that directly in PHP.

== Global Template Functions

* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-array-key-exists[array_key_exists] — Checks if a key exists in the array.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-arsort[arsort] — Sorts an array in reverse order while maintaining the index association.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-asort[asort] — Sorts an array while maintaining the index association.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-bin2hex[bin2hex] — Returns an ASCII string that contains the parameter's hexadecimal output.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-ceil[ceil] — Returns the next integer that is greater than or equal to the parameter.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-count[count] — Counts all elements in an array or attributes in an object.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-curl-close[curl_close] — Ends a cURL session.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-curl-exec[curl_exec] — Runs a cURL session.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-curl-init[curl_init] — Starts a cURL session.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-curl-setopt[curl_setopt] — Sets an option for a cURL transfer.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-current[current] — Returns the current element in an array.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-date[date] — Formats a specified local time / date.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-explode[explode] — Splits a string by string to create an array.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-floor[floor] — Returns the next integer that is less than or equal to the parameter.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-htmlentities[htmlentities] — Converts all suitable characters to HTML codes.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-implode[implode] — Combines array elements to a string.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-in-array[in_array] — Checks if a value exists in an array.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-is-array[is_array] — Checks if the variable is an array.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-is-numeric[is_numeric] — Checks if a variable is a number or a numeric string.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-is-string[is_string] — Checks if the variable is of the type String.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-json-decode[json_decode] — Decodes a JSON character string. The result can be saved to a local template variable.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-json-encode[json_encode] — Returns the JSON representation of a value.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-krsort[krsort] — Sorts an array by keys in reverse order.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-ksort[ksort] — Sorts an array by keys.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-md5[md5] — Calculate a string's MD5 hash.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-natcasesort[natcasesort] — Sorts an array by natural order ignoring case.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-natsort[natsort] — Sorts an array by natural order.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-nl2br[nl2br] — Inserts HTML line wraps before all line wraps of a string.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-number-format[number_format] — Formats a number with grouped thousands.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-print[print] — Returns the contained value as HTML. Permitted values are a template variable or a string.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-round[round] — Rounds the first parameter to the number of decimal places specified in the second parameter.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-rsort[rsort] — Sorts an array in reverse order.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-simplexml-load-string[simplexml_load_string] — Converts a string to a simpleXML object and returns this object.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-sort[sort] — Sorts an array.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-str-replace[str_replace] — Replaces all occurrences of a search string by a different string.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-strip-tags[strip_tags] — Removes HTML tags from a string.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-stripos[stripos] — Finds the first occurrence of a string ignoring case.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-strlen[strlen] — Detects the string length.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-strpos[strpos] — Finds the search string's first occurrence.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-strtolower[strtolower] — Makes a string lowercase.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-strtotime[strtotime] — Parses any English date format into a Unix timestamp.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-strtoupper[strtoupper] — Makes all characters of a string uppercase.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-substr[substr] — Returns part of a string.
* xref:omni-channel:cms-syntax.adoc#global-phpfunctions-trim[trim] — Strips whitespace or other characters from the beginning and end of a string.

== Global Template Variables

* $ENT_COMPAT — Constant: Only converts double quotation marks. Single quotation marks are not converted and remain unchanged.
* $ENT_QUOTES — Constant: Converts both double and single quotation marks.
